import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown" import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Alert from "react-bootstrap/Alert"; // import { addOrganizationApi } from "../../services/api"; const InitialValues ={ oType : "", oName : "", oAuthoName : "", oMobNo : "", oAddress : "", oCity : "", oEmail : "", oRegisNo : "", oUrl : "", oUserName : "", oPassword : "", oRePassword:"" } export default function OrganizationRegistration() { const [org,setOrg] = useState(InitialValues); const onValueChange2 = (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.name, e.target.innerText); setOrg({...org, [e.target.name] : e.target.innerText}) console.log(org); } const onValueChange = (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.name, e.target.value); setOrg({...org, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) console.log(org); } const addOrganization = async () => { // await addOrganizationApi(org); } return (
Type of Organization Select type of Organization {onValueChange2(e)}} name="oType" >ngo {onValueChange2(e)}} name="oType">non-ngo Name Organization onValueChange(e)} name="oName" /> Name of Authority onValueChange(e)} name="oAuthoName" /> Mobile No onValueChange(e)} name="oMobNo" /> Address onValueChange(e)} name="oAddress" /> City onValueChange(e)} name="oCity" /> Email Address onValueChange(e)} name="oEmail" /> Registration Number onValueChange(e)} name="oRegisNo" /> URL of Organization onValueChange(e)} name="oUrl" /> User Name onValueChange(e)} name="oUserName" /> Password onValueChange(e)} name="oPassword" /> Re-Enter Password onValueChange(e)} name="oRePassword" />
); }
